page.title: 11FISHBURN INDUSTRIAL ESTATE.
page.content: A NEW ESTATE THAT IS BEING DEVELOPED. THE COUNCIL ARE USING THE WASTE LAND WHERE THE NOW-CLOSED FISHBURN COLLIERY WAS.FIRST OF ALL SOME OF THE COLLIERY BUILDINGS WERE USED.THE PIT HEAD BATHS BECAME A CLOTHING FACTORY. OTHER BUILDINGS ARE USED BY THE LOCAL BRASS BAND AND THE ST.JOHN AMBULANCE BRIGADE.LATELY THE SITE HAS BEEN DEVELOPED FURTHER.2 NEW FACTORIES ARE BEING BUILT BUT NO ONE IS USING THEM YET.THERE IS ENOUGH SPACE FOR MORE FACTORIES TO BE BUILT.A NEW ROAD IS BEING MADE TO BE USED BY LORRIES AND FACTORY WORKERS CARS.NEXT TO THE COLLIERY IS THE PIT HEAP.IT IS BEING FLATTENED.TREES WILL BE PLANTED AND IT WILL BE TURNED INTO FIELDS AND A NATURE TRAIL.SIMILAR DEVELOPMENT IS HAPPENING IN MANY PIT VILLAGES AND IS HELPING TO MAKE NEW JOBS WHERE THERE IS A LOT OF UNEMPLOYMENT.
